We are truly honored to introduce you to our Baby Sloth $Fantasy token. $Fantasy is an ERC20 token located on the Ethereum network.

ABOUT US

Baby Sloth Club Saga:

They were no different from their relatives; living typical Baby Sloth lives and munching on leaves and drinking milk. Until a curious and mischievous Baby Sloth ventured beyond the safety of the community into the unknown.

Following a dreamy, strange scent...traversing in the deepest shadows of the jungle...the curious Baby sloth stumbles upon an other-worldly forest that was surrounded by pungent-smelling plants so high they



covered the sun and sky. Caving into temptation, the Baby Sloth touches the plant and is propelled by a vision portraying his true purpose in the universe: To save all the Baby Sloths across all the forests far and wide. With the knowledge acquired, he slowly walks back home

to spread the good word. BEHOLD! The Enlightened One, the first,is born and paves the path for generations to come. Legacies of endless Baby Sloth dance parties from dusk-till-dawn, all-you-can-eat fruit and leaf buffets, and partying to the sounds of adorable squeaking Baby Sloths echoed for decades

INTO THE PROJECT

UTOPIA! In the rich soil of the enchanted forest, Baby Sloths gathered to embrace the tree of life. However, all good things come to an end. A cataclysmic storm dispersed all the Baby Sloths away from their paradise and the enchanted tree of life was lost forever. The Elder Sloths still believe the Enlightened One is still alive and residing in the enchanted forest...waiting for a new generation. A NEW HOPE! The 10000 newly-born Baby Sloths are destined to return the Baby Sloth community to their former glory. Practicing the ways of their ancestors and determined to find the enchanted tree of life, the newly-born Baby Sloth’s must find the tree of life!

NFT COLLECTION

10,000 Unique Sloths That Will Animate In Our Game With Many Perks, Accessories & Upgrades Available

TOKENOMICS

Play to Earn $Fantasy Cryptocurrency

  • ERC-20 Token on Ethereum Blockchain
  • Daily $Fantasy Income
  • BSC Metaverse Business
  • Stock/Shares Acquiring
  • LAND Purchase WL for LAND Minting
  • NFT Staking for Additional Income
  • NFT Character Trait Upgrades
  • In Game Cosmetics/Assets & Perks Development

ROADMAP

Stage 1 | Community Building

Refferal Program

Our referral program is truly the first of its kind in the NFT space! Our utility starts the moment you are approved for our invite only Discord! You’ll be granted 100 $Fantasy upon entering our VIP community Each $Fantasy is currently valued at $.10 ****VERY IMPORTANT**** You can not access these tokens unless you own the NFT! There is no cap on how many tokens you can earn. So how do you earn the $Fantasy? Pre Mint, you can acquire tokens in 2 ways . The first way is through being active and leveling up in the discord.The second way is by inspiring and referring friends, family, colleagues, and others to join our VIP community. For every person you bring to the discord, you will have the opportunity earn another 100 $Fantasy. With your help we are building the best and brightest community in the NFT space. After minting your Baby Sloth Club NFT through out website or buying it on OpenSeayou can immediately be able to start staking your NFT. You can also earn $Fantasy by grinding our P2E game as you will get rewarded for every level you pass. Sharing your game progress on social media will grant you bonus tokens as well! Stay tuned for the game. We will also be hosting many giveaways pre and post mint so make sure to tune in for that too.

Mint

Mint day is where our precious Baby Sloth holders will be able to claim their $Fantasy, and start staking. Mark your calendars because you won’t want to miss out on this one, and understand that the mint is just the beginning! We’ve got many things planned. Stay tuned for more information.

{/* STAGE 1 END */}

Stage 2 | $Fantasy Launch

$FANTASY Launch Immediately Post Mint

o all of our future Baby Sloth holders, here is where you will receive all the $Fantasy you have accumulated so far. Everything is unlocked for you and the sky's the limit in terms of opportunities on your sloth journey!

Staking & Utility

That’s right! After mint you’ll be able to officially start staking your NFT. You can earn up to 200 $Fantasy a day. You can use these tokens to increase the rarity of your sloth. We’re not kidding! So here’s how it’s gonna work. For every rarity, the duration of your staking term will be different. The longer you let your sloth explore the wildlife, the more valuable it will come back to you.

Here are the times for each rarity:

Common -> Uncommon : 1 month

Uncommon —> Rare: 2 months

Rare —> Epic: 3 months

Epic —> Legendary: 4 months

During the time that your sloth is exploring the wild, be sure to engage in our P2E game (coming soon), as well as continue grinding in the discord to accumulate more $Fantasy!

Store

Your $Fantasy Tokens can also be used in our VIP store. Use your $Fantasy to buy exclusive Baby Sloth Club Merch, physical collectables, in game boosts, as well as access to our exclusive VIP meetups and events

Stage 3 | P2E

P2E Game & Metaverse

Our NFT holders will have access to our own exclusive game in the Metaverse. Our vision for this game is for our community to have fun while exploring Web3.0. You’ll have your own Sloth to play with as a character and your objective will be to take care of your sloth and nurture him in life. You get to explore and decide which career path you want your sloth to take. After completing each task that’s presented to you, you’ll earn $Fantasy. A sloth that completes the game, will be solidified as a more valuable Baby Sloth NFT. We encourage you to play the game again as the second time, your sloth will now be earning you double $Fantasy. Not only will you have a great time in this game, we made sure that investing your time benefits you a huge return.
